column4: Did anyone think of what I can do with my webcam? And please, no !webcam.
I put one on my windows and there is a software that is activation-enabled
so I record all the hot chicks that walk by
I've put it in, ran EasyCam2 here in Linux. It installed something, but it didn't work. I've researched it and the commands that were used gave me the result thats in the pastebin.
